name: SupportTethysAndRennac
_source: speak;Rennac;Are you Tethys, the dancer who captivates all audiences?
speak;Rennac;Oh, you don't know me?|That's so disappointing.|I am Rennac of Carcino.|I beg your indulgence...
speak;Tethys;It's a pleasure to meet you, Rennac.|However, I'm a bit busy at the moment.|Perhaps we could talk another time.
speak;Rennac;Is that so?|Very well then.|Another day.
speak;Rennac;And perhaps I could have you dance for me and me alone.
speak;Tethys;Hm?|I will of course dance if you ask, but...|For you and you alone?|Are you perhaps attempting to woo me?|If that's the case, you should stop.|I've...
speak;Rennac;No, no, that's not what I was intending at all.|Yet many women who say they're not interested end up in my arms all the same.
speak;Tethys;Well, if that's the case, maybe I'll keep my eye on you.|If you turn out to be such a catch, I may rethink my stance.
speak;Rennac;It's a deal then.|I ask that you observe my conduct closely.|Good day.
speak;Tethys;Oh, dear...|I think he took me seriously.|I hope he doesn't get his hopes up too high.
speak;Rennac;Ah, the beauteous Tethys.|It's a pleasure to see you again.|Well?|Have I made an impression on you yet?
speak;Tethys;Well...|You seem to be...unobjectionable.|Yet you've a long way to go, I think.
speak;Rennac;That's a bit severe, isn't it?|Is there something specific you desire?
speak;Tethys;Oh, well...perhaps you could bring me something?
speak;Rennac;Bring you something?|A gift, is that it?|Very well.|What shall it be?
speak;Rennac;Tethys.|I've been looking for you.|You haven't been avoiding me, have you?
speak;Rennac;The object you spoke of the other day?|I have it here.|Please take a look.
speak;Rennac;You forgot what you asked for, didn't you?
speak;Rennac;OK, then take a look.|Here it is.
speak;Rennac;It's as big as a fist.|Notice how the red, white, and blue colors play across the surface of the gems.
speak;Rennac;Well, I brought it to you as promised.|So this proves that I'm worthy, does it not?
speak;Tethys;Yes.|I now realize that despite your appearance, you're a very hard worker.|Does that make you a good catch?|Hmm...I'm still not convinced.
speak;Rennac;Really?|How disappointing.|Is there something else you desire?
